This is a 2 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 878 Sq.
Ft.
Ridgetop Apartments offer newly renovated 1, 2 and 3 bedroom apartments with washer/dryers, fireplaces and modern conveniences in Silverdale, WA, less than 2 miles from Highway 3 and Highway 303.
We are also in close proximity to The Trails at Silverdale and the Kitsap Mall.
Enjoy our spectacular views of the Olympic Mountains and on-site 24/7 fitness centers, pool and spa, and professional management.
Plus, we're within 8 miles of Bremerton, Bangor, Harrison Medical Center and Puget Sound Naval Shipyard so you can easily commute to work.
The Bremerton Ferry Terminal and high-speed ferry are just a short drive away!
Call now to arrange a virtual tour of Ridgetop!
Features:

Wheelchair Access, Vaulted Ceilings*, Olympic Mountain Views*, Ceiling Fan, Wood Burning Fireplace, Baseboard Heating, Garbage Disposal, Tech Ready, Washer & Dryer, Additional Storage, Private Patio/Balcony, Dishwasher, Oversized Closets, Carport with Every Home
Community Amenities:

24 Hour Fitness Center, Located in a Residential Neighborhood, Covered Parking, Spa/Hot Tub, Walking Distance to Clear Creek Trail, Rental Furniture Available From CORT, Close to PSNS and Naval Base Kitsap, Monthly Resident Events, High-speed/Wi-Fi, TV Lounge, Newly Renovated Clubhouse, On-Site Maintenance, Pool, Business Center, On-Site Management, Package Concierge, Accepts Electronic Payments, Dog Park and Walking Paths
Pet Policy
Cats and Dogs are allowed.
We do allow pets in our apartment communities.
Our policy is as follows: *1.
Only 3 pets are permitted in each apartment.
It is our policy to accept only dogs, cats, birds and fish.
Acceptance of dogs is based on breed.

Breed restrictions are as follows: Pit Bull/Staffordshire Terriers, Rottweilers, Dobermans, Saint Bernards's, Great Danes, German Shepherds, Chows, Presa Canarios, Akitas, Alaskan Malamutes, Wolf-hybrids, full blood or mixed at a percentage are prohibited from residing at our Community.
A Pet Agreement and Fee will be required for the first pet and an additional non-refundable fee may apply for additional pets.
Service animals may accompany a resident with a verifiable disability for the purpose of aiding that person are not considered pets.
